seo_content:
Exclusive Nordic Funder Trading Offer

Nordic Funder, based in Sweden and established in November 2021, is a CFD proprietary trading firm offering 1 Step, 2 Steps, and 3 Steps program types. The firm supports cTrader, DXTrade, and Match market participant platforms. Nordic Funder uses broker Scandinavian Capital Markets. certified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: Nordic Funder Promo Code: Check website Discount
youtube_metadata.description: Get funded with Nordic Funder using our exclusive discount code. confirmed for the current trading season.
